author: Xbox
description:
Pre-order now just here: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/roadcraft/9nkmp84vvwnx

Disaster won’t wait, will you?

With 8 vast maps to explore, take control of heavy machinery and rebuild industries in devastated regions. Experience advanced real-time physics as you manage resources, tackle challenges, and reshape the aftermath.

Plus, team up with up to 4 players in co-op to rebuild together.

description:

author: Xbox
description:
Mundfish studio and Focus Entertainment are excited to celebrate the release of Atomic Heart’s third DLC “Enchantment Under the Sea”! 

Available as part of the Atomic Pass, this DLC gets back to exploring the aftermath of the campaign’s main storyline by leaving Limbo behind and taking players back to explore Facility 3826. There, they’ll be introduced to a new underwater Neptune Research Center, new weapons and glove abilities as well as new sea-dwelling threats!

Atomic Heart is out now on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One.

author: Xbox
description:
Embark upon a vast, snow-ravaged kingdom in Tails of Iron 2, sequel to the critically acclaimed action-RPG. As Arlo, heir to the Warden of the Wastes, adventure through harsh northern lands, home to giant beasts and ragtag bandits, in an epic quest to overcome an ancient, blood-starved evil.

Buy Now on Xbox Series X|S: 
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/tails-of-iron-2-whiskers-of-winter/9ppkmqfxr7fr

author: Xbox
description:
The Stone of Madness is available now on Xbox Series X|S

From the studio that brought you the Blasphemous series comes The Stone of Madness: a real-time tactical stealth game set in an 18th-century Spanish Monastery. Located in the Pyrenees, this time-worn Jesuit monastery is home to a madhouse and an inquisitorial prison. Five prisoners - plagued by cruel punishment, madness, and despair - pool their skills and resources to face their phobias, stave off insanity, uncover the mysteries of the Monastery, and find a way to escape.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/the-stone-of-madness/9N0RJRF5JRP8/0017

author: Xbox
description:
Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap combines chaotic third-person combat with devious trap-laying strategy. Enjoy endless replayability as your War Mage grows stronger with every battle. Repel relentless orc hordes solo or with up to 4 players.

Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap is out now on Xbox Series X|S, PC and Game Pass.
